snippet: Kyle Korver busted out of a shooting slump and buried the banged-up Boston Celtics with a barrage of first-half 3-pointers in an 89-72 Atlanta Hawks win in Game 2 Tuesday at Philips Arena....
lead_paragraph: Kyle Korver busted out of a shooting slump and buried the banged-up Boston Celtics with a barrage of first-half 3-pointers in an 89-72 Atlanta Hawks win in Game 2 Tuesday at Philips Arena.

headline.main: Korver Breaks Out of Slump to Lead Hawks to Victory
headline.print_headline: Korver Breaks Out of Slump to Lead Hawks to Victory
